ping.title: üèì Pong! üèì
ping.isDev: This is a development version of ActivityRank.

rank.noEntries: No entries found for this page.

bonus.cannotAddXP: You cannot add bonus XP to bots.
bonus.massXP: This server already has a mass role operation running.
bonus.successfully_one: Successfully gave `{{changeAmount}}` bonus XP to {{affected}} member with role {{role}}
bonus.successfully_other: Successfully gave `{{changeAmount}}` bonus XP to {{affected}} members with role {{role}}

config-channel.deprecated:
## No-Command and Command-Only Channels are __deprecated__.

Manage Application Command permissions in **Server Settings ‚ùØ Integrations ‚ùØ ActivityRank** instead!

*You can still **disable** No-Command and Command-Only channels.*'
config-channel.noXPDescription: If this is enabled, no xp will be given in this channel.
config-channel.noCommandDescription:
If this is enabled, commands will not work in this channel.
> **Note:** It is recommended to use the Discord native system in **Server Settings ‚ùØ Integrations ‚ùØ ActivityRank** instead
config-channel.commandOnlyDescription:
If this is enabled, this will be the **only channel commands will work in**, unless you have the **Manage Server** permission.
> **Note:** It is recommended to use the Discord native system in **Server Settings ‚ùØ Integrations ‚ùØ ActivityRank** instead.
config-channel.joinChannelDescription: If this is enabled, server join messages will be sent to this channel.
config-channel.levelupChannelDescription: If this is enabled, levelup messages will be sent to this channel.
config-channel.conflict:
You have specified both a channel and an ID, but they do not match.
Did you mean: "/config-channel channel:{{value}}"?
config-channel.notSpecified: You need to specify either a channel or a channel's ID!
config-channel.missingPerms: You need the permission to manage the server in order to use this command.

config-member.notifyDMDescription: If this is enabled, the bot will send you a DM when you level up.
config-member.reactVoteDescription: If this is enabled, reacting with the server's voteEmote, {{emote}}, will give an upvote to the member that sent the message.

config-messages.joinMessageDescription: The message to send when a member joins the server
config-messages.levelupMessageDescription: The message to send when a member gains a level
config-messages.assignMessageDescription: The message to send when a member gains a role, unless overridden
config-messages.deassignMessageDescription: The message to send when a member loses a role, unless overridden
config-messages.askClear: Which message do you want to clear?

config-role.everyone: You cannot make @everyone a level role.
config-role.manageRoles: Please ensure the bot has the permission to manage roles.
config-role.error1:
Using an assignLevel higher than or equal to a deassignLevel will not work: the role gets removed as soon as it gets added!
Did you mean: **assign-level:{{deassignLevel}} deassign-level:{{assignLevel}}**?
config-role.maxRoles: There is a maximum of 3 roles that can be assigned or deassigned from each level. Please remove some first.
config-role.noXPDescription: If this is enabled, no xp will be given to members that have this role.
config-role.assignMessageDescription: This is the message sent when this role is given to a member. Defaults to the global assignMessage.
config-role.deassignMessageDescription: This is the message sent when this role is removed from a member. Defaults to the global deassignMessage.
config-role.toClear: Which message do you want to clear?'
config-role.assignToSend: The message to send upon assignment
config-role.deassignToSend: The message to send upon deassignment

config-server.modifiedCD:
Modified Cooldown Values! New values:
Messages will only give XP if their author has not sent one in the last `{{messageTime}}`.
Votes will have a cooldown of `{{voteTime}}`.
config-server.entriesPerPage: The server will now see `{{entriesPerPage}}` entries per page.
config-server.useNicknameDescription: If this is enabled, nicknames will be used to represent members instead of their Discord usernames
config-server.reactVoteDescription: If this is enabled, members will be permitted to vote using the server's voteEmote, {{value}}
config-server.mutedXPDescription: If this is enabled, members will be permitted to gain XP in VCs, even when they are muted.
config-server.deafenedXPDescription: If this is enabled, members will be permitted to gain XP in VCs, even when they are deafened.
config-server.soloXPDescription: If this is enabled, members will be permitted to gain XP in VCs, even when they are alone. Bots do not count.
config-server.TAAROLDfull: TAAROLD (Take Away Assigned Roles On Level Down)
config-server.TAAROLDDescription: If this is enabled, the bot will remove roles when the member falls below their assignLevel.
config-server.notifyDMDescription:
If this is enabled, the bot will allow members to receive levelup notifications via DM.
You cannot select this if either of the below two options are enabled, because they will take priority.
config-server.lastChannelDescription:
If this is enabled, the bot will notify members of their levelups in their last used text channel.
You cannot select this if the below option is enabled, because it will take priority.
config-server.includeLVLupDescription:
If this is enabled, when a role has a custom roleAssign message, the bot will also send the default levelup message.
Otherwise, it will only send the roleAssign message.
config-server.emojiDescription:
These will enable or disable text, voice, invite, and upvoteXP respectively.
You may want to reset these categories, as disabling them will only hide them and prevent more from being added.
config-server.resetDescription: This will reset the XP of members when they leave the server.
config-server.stickyRolesDescription: This will give members that have left the server the appropriate roles for the level they had when they left.

missing.manageServer: You need the permission to manage the server in order to use this command.
missing.option: You must specify at least one option for this command to do anything!
missing.notOnServer: This member is not on the server.

config-xp.newSettings:
Modified Bonus XP Values! New values:

* `{{bonusPerTextMessage}} xp` per text message
* `{{bonusPerVoiceMinute}} xp` per minute in VC
* `{{bonusPerVote}} xp` per vote
* `{{bonusPerInvite}} xp` per invite
config-xp.bonusStart: Bonus time has started! It will end <t:{{bonusUntilSec}}:R>
config-xp.levelfactor: Your server's levelfactor is now set to `{{levelfactor}}`
config-xp.cannotEveryone: You cannot configure the xp-per @everyone. Try `/config-xp xp-per` instead.
config-xp.resetXPper: Are you sure you want to reset the special XP settings of {{role}}?
config-xp.maxRoles: There is a maximum of {{maxRoles}} roles that can be set as xp-per roles. Please remove some first.
config-xp.extraMaxRoles: Get an extra 10 xp-per roles by subscribing to Patreon Tier 2!
config-xp.modified: Modified XP Values for {{role}! New values:
config-xp.notAffected: Users XP will no longer be affected by {{role}}.
config-xp.modifiedXPValues:
Modified XP Values! New values:

* `{{xpPerTextMessage}} xp` per text message
* `{{xpPerVoiceMinute}} xp` per minute in VC
* `{{xpPerVote}} xp` per vote
* `{{xpPerInvite}} xp` per invite

reset.channel: Are you sure you want to reset all the statistics of {{channelMention}}?
reset.user: Are you sure you want to reset all the statistics and XP of {{user}}?

deleted.confirmationChannel:
Are you sure you want to reset all the statistics of **all {{size}} deleted channels in the server**?

**This cannot be undone.**
deleted.confirmationUser:
Are you sure you want to reset all the statistics of **all {{size}} users that have left the server**?

**This cannot be undone.**

server.confirmationAll:
Are you sure you want to reset **all server settings, XP, and statistics?**

**This cannot be undone.**
server.confirmationSettings: Are you sure you want to reset all server settings to their default values?
server.type: Which types of XP would you like to reset?
server.confirmationXP:
Are you sure you want to reset **all server members XP**?

This will not reset associated statistics - try **/reset server statistics**! **This cannot be undone.**

inviter.disabled: Invite XP is disabled on this server.
inviter.ownInviter: You cannot be the inviter of yourself.
inviter.alreadySet: You have already set your inviter. This setting is unchangeable.
inviter.invited: You cannot set your inviter to a person who has been invited by you.
inviter.bot: You cannot set a bot as your inviter.
inviter.noXP: The member you are trying to set as your inviter cannot be selected, because of an assigned noXP role.
inviter.confirmation:
Are you sure that {{inviter}} was the person who invited you?
-# **You cannot change this setting once you confirm it.**
inviter.success: Your inviter has been set successfully. You will both get 1 invite added to your stats.
